text: Christopher John Wilder (born 23 September 1967) is an English professional football manager who had played as a right-back. He was most recently the manager of EFL Championship club Watford. ==References== Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Brighton & Hove Albion F.C. players Category:Charlton Athletic F.C. players Category:English footballers Category:English football managers Category:Sheffield United F.C. players Category:Southampton F.C. players Category:Sportspeople from Sheffield Category:Association football coaches
title: Chris Wilder
